appName: Pro Dino Hunt VR: Jurassic Hunting World
displayName: Pro Dino Hunt VR: Jurassic Hunting World
display_name: Pro Dino Hunt VR: Jurassic Hunting World
display_long_description:
Immerse yourself in a thrilling VR adventure where dinosaurs rule the land and skies. With stunning visuals and exciting gameplay, explore a prehistoric world across three unique modes:

Chapter Mode:
Face action-packed levels where survival is your goal. Arm yourself with a sniper rifle, pistol, and shotgun to hunt down relentless dinosaurs. Manage your health as you battle waves of predators in this intense mode.

Explore Mode:
Wander freely through a beautifully crafted Jurassic environment. Observe a variety of dinosaurs up close, marveling at their lifelike details and behaviors. This mode offers a peaceful escape for nature enthusiasts.

Flying Mode:
Soar through the skies on the back of a majestic Pteranodon! Glide above the stunning landscape as your flying companion takes you on a breathtaking tour, showcasing dinosaurs in their natural habitat.

Meet the Dinosaurs:
Encounter legendary creatures like the T-Rex, Spinosaurus, Triceratops, Brachiosaurus, Compsognathus, Oviraptor, Velociraptor, and the Pteranodon.

How to Play:

Move: Use the left controller joystick to navigate the environment.
Look Around: Use the right controller joystick to adjust the camera view.
Shoot: Press the trigger buttons to fire your weapon.
Open Menu: Press the A button to access the menu.
Reset Position: Long press the Meta button to recalibrate your position.
